{"id":1289253539,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â days","timestamp":1718470508,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1289253539/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"45.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int[] suffixes = new int[nums.length];\n        for (int i = nums.length-2; i >= 0; i--) {\n            suffixes[i] += nums[i+1] + suffixes[i+1];\n        }\n        if (suffixes[0] == 0) {\n            return 0;\n        }\n\n        int prefix = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            prefix += nums[i-1];\n            if (prefix == suffixes[i]) {\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
